728986f-a.title: Richmond: Hylan Boulevard - Anderson Street
728986f-a.text:
Rylan Boulevard, at the N.W. corner of Anderson Street, showing Public School No. 13. The view is from the bridge of the Staten Island Railroad which spans the Boulevard to the west of the school.
Jan. 18, 1931.
P. L. Sperr
728986f-a.folder: Hylan Boulevard & Anderson Street, Staten Island, NY
